title: #20 Heated Race Debate With Phil "Advise". Jordan Crowder Stops In
description: This week, Phil of the AdviseShow on youtube stopped by. Things got a little heated, but remained civil as we discussed race relations, politics and Mike Brown.  Also, Jordan Crowder stops by to talk the latest Robert Downey controversy, and being a Conservative in Hollywood.
